attributes.action: Remove petitions from this site if less than 10 signatures are received within one week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are a lot of petitions which are of no interest except to the petitioner. this is proved by the number of single signature petitions, I believe this devalues this site and would like to have petitions that do not receive sufficient support to be removed.

rejection.details: Please send comments on the petitions system to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
